You were asked by the Governor of Yellowport to assassinate Nergan Corin. It is a good time to make the attempt. If you want to have a go,
make a COMBAT or a THIEVERY roll at Difficulty 12 .
If you succeed, .
If you fail, .

If you would rather join the rebels and kill the governor instead, record the codeword Ambuscade. If you join the rebels, when you are ready, the king wishes you well, and you are led out of the stockade and back down to the foothills of the Coldbleak Mountains. .
